data.description: simplify writing functions with default args
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Picking a good name for this module was a big stumbling block in
    the process of releasing it. The point is to make it easy to write
    functions that will operate on $_ if called with no arguments and
    will modify their arguments in-place in void context but return
    modified copies in any other context. Sub::ArgShortcut seems to be
    as close to describing this in three words as one can get.
